DESCRIPTION:
Urban Trial Freestyle - it's exciting arcade racing, in which you will rush for more than 20 tracks that ran through the five areas of the abandoned city. Three different modes (Stunt Mode, Time Attack, Challenge Mode), present in the game, and the ability to create your own superbike is not only enrich the gameplay, but also make the race even more interesting.
